sections.heading: fleet vehicle; use state fuel; surcharge
sections.text: (1) Any person using a bureau fleet vehicle shall, whenever possible, obtain fuel from state-owned facilities.(2) The bureau may place a surcharge on any agency whose employees have not complied with subsection (1) of this section.SourceLaws 1981, LB 381, ยง 1

81-1019.Bureau fleet vehicle; use state fuel; surcharge.

(1) Any person using a bureau fleet vehicle shall, whenever possible, obtain fuel from state-owned facilities.

(2) The bureau may place a surcharge on any agency whose employees have not complied with subsection (1) of this section.

SourceLaws 1981, LB 381, ยง 17;Laws 2012, LB779, ยง 9.
